metadata.name: Serevent Evohaler 25 micrograms per actuation pressurised inhalation suspension
metadata.composition: One metered dose ex valve contains 25 micrograms salmeterol as xinafoate This is equivalent to a delivered dose ex actuator of 21 micrograms salmeterol as xinafoate For the full list of

clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Asthma Serevent is indicated for the regular symptomatic add on treatment of reversible airways obstruction in patients with asthma including those with nocturnal asthma who are inadequately controlled on inhaled corticosteroids in accordance with current treatment guidelines Serevent is also indicated in the prevention of exercise induced asthma Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease COPD Serevent is indicated in the treatment of patients with COPD

contraindications.disease: Hypersensitivity to salmeterol xinafoate or to any of the excipients listed in section 6 1
